message.content: I want to set up authentication using JWT tokens instead of session cookies.
Good choice. JWT tokens are stateless and work well for API-first architectures. I'll set up the auth middleware with RS256 signing.
Actually, let's use HS256 - simpler for a single-service setup.
Decision noted: HS256 for JWT signing. I'll configure the secret in environment variables.
I keep getting CORS errors when the frontend calls the API.
The CORS middleware needs to allow the frontend origin. Let me add that. Lesson learned: always configure CORS early in the project.
